data.name: ReadCase
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CASE where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCaseRole1
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (@casNumber = CAS_NUMBER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (TYPE = @type)

data.name: ReadCaseRole2
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (@casNumber = CAS_NUMBER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (TYPE = 'AP') and (START_DATE <= @startDate) and (END_DATE >= @startDate)

data.name: ReadCaseRole3
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (@casNumber = CAS_NUMBER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (TYPE = 'AR') and (START_DATE <= @startDate) and (END_DATE >= @startDate)

data.name: ReadCaseUnit1
data.value: select CU_NUMBER, CLOSURE_DATE, CAS_NO, CSP_NO_AR, CSP_NO_AP from CKT_CASE_UNIT where (@casNo = CAS_NO) and (@cspNoAp = CSP_NO_AP) and (CLOSURE_DATE >= @closureDate)

data.name: ReadCaseUnit2
data.value: select CU_NUMBER, CLOSURE_DATE, CAS_NO, CSP_NO_AR, CSP_NO_AP from CKT_CASE_UNIT where (@casNo = CAS_NO) and (@cspNoAr = CSP_NO_AR) and (CLOSURE_DATE >= @closureDate)

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadInterstateRequest
data.value: select top(1) IDENTIFIER, KS_CASE_IND, CAS_I_NUMBER from CKT_INTERSTAT_RQST where (@casINumber = CAS_I_NUMBER) and (KS_CASE_IND = 'N')
